TopicTitle: My first space ship to reach orbit

Articles.Content:
Hi the best thing in KSP for me is to build big spaceship and as you may know it hard to build big things in KSP because of lag.

I spent hours looking for mods that would improve my fps and i found a few that lower my part count and in the end i got my stock spaceship from 800 parts to 318.So the plan for this ship was to build a spaceship that could carry a smaller space plane to orbit.First part of the plan worked it can get to low orbit with 0 fuel left now all i have to do is build a smaller ship and refueling station.

What i would like you guys to do is to test the spaceship see how it files any improvements i could do and if there any problems with my plan.

Mods use in building of this spaceship B9_Aerospace KerbalJointReinforcement optional Kerb Paint MechJeb2 for ez flying.

Ship spec

Mnopropellant 758

fuel 7524/16448

oxidizer 8316/20103

max acceleration 15.44

Max thrust 2280

Vessel mass 147.701 t

Surface TWR 1.57

Crew capacity 1

Stock ver 800 parts.

With mods 318

Space yey

Download

http://www.sendspace.com/file/hm53fy

Edited January 31, 2014 by soulriver1
There's absolutely no way that this intricate leviathan of a space plane is your first ship to reach orbit. Do you mean it's your first winged craft/plane to orbit?
Stock looks like the Kestrel from FTL.
Hi camaron dont know what u mean by winged craft but that my second ship i build in KSP.My first ship i build in KSP is this plane.
